name: 1WEEK
description:
Seek refuge underground before the apocalypse strikes, and survive a world without oxygen by using genetically modified plants. Can you get them all before it’s too late?

Build

Create tools, collect resources and build a shelter. This will be your new home.

Fight

Defend yourself from those corrupted by famine and loneliness. Loot to survive.

Current features:

  • Single player PVE sandbox experience.
  • Crafting mechanics, workstations.
  • Dynamic base building.
  • Weapons and tools system.
  • Extraction and refining of resources.
  • Enemies.
  • Agriculture.
  • Food cooking mechanics.
  • Day-night cycle.
  • Character state mechanics.
  • Oxygen system.
  • Procedural generation map and resources.
